desc: Kailua Honey is a small family business located in Kailua, O'ahu, Hawaii. We started keeping our own bees a couple years ago, and started selling our raw honey at farmers's markets, and now we specialize in raw honey, infused honeys, and Hawaiian Macadamia Nut Honey butters.

layout.text: Our latest infused honey is made with Hawaiian Chili Peppers from our backyard.
